title: About for my Creator
about:
Hello ! My name is Stanislav, I am 16 years old. I live in the city of Burgas, I study at PGEE Konstantin Fotinov, specialty Applied Programmer . 
 My hobby is to programm some small projects,too and to read programming books.
 My favourite programming languages are JavaScript, PHP, Python and a bit of Csharp  for the Sql and Html structure.
